hero_section.title.2: Integrate with OpenAI, Google Gemini & More
hero_section.title.3: Build in React, Deploy Anywhere You Like
hero_section.title.4: Explore a Growing Ecosystem of Plugins
hero_section.title.5: Discover a Diverse Range of Rich Themes
hero_section.heading.1: A community-driven platform for crafting modern chatbots.

features_section.title: What separates us from the rest
features_section.heading.1: We envision a vibrant community where creativity and collaboration thrive, enabling chatbots to become more customizable and accessible for everyone.

features.title: Extensive Library
features.description: Access a growing collection of themes, plugins and features.

features.title: Open Source
features.description: Created to be open from the get-go: no hidden data scraping or selling your info to third parties.

features.title: Easy Integration
features.description: Download and integrate themes and plugins into your chatbot effortlessly.

features.title: LLM Ready
features.description: Seamlessly incorporate OpenAI, Gemini, or local models with a plug-and-play LLM connector.

features.title: Collaborative Community
features.description: Join a community of like-minded developers, share your creations, and contribute to the growth of the platform.

features.title: Developer-First CLI
features.description: Quickly scaffold themes, plugins, and widgets with our purpose-built CLI tool.

features.title: High Customizability
features.description: Easily add new functionalities to improve the user experience of your chatbot.

features.title: Deploy Anywhere
features.description: Compile to a tiny JS snippet and embed the bot in any site such as WordPress.

features_at_glance_section_section.title: Awesome features straight out the box
features_at_glance_section_section.heading.1: Modern chatbot with modern features from the get-go. Need something more specific? Check out our premade plugins or create a feature request via our Discord.

features.heading: Customize appearance with themes
features.description: Browse a growing selection of premade themes

features.heading: Extend functionalities with plugins
features.description: Easily access additional features with plugins

features.heading: Integrate with LLMs out of the box
features.description: Implement AI functionality with ease and speed

features.heading: Go beyond the React ecosystem
features.description: Build in React, but deploy your chatbot anywhere

project_section.title: Projects & contributors
project_section.heading.1: We are grateful to the many developers who have contributed to the development of React ChatBotify Gallery, as well as authors of themes & plugins, to make the Gallery what it is today. Your involvement helps keep the platform dynamic and relevant.
project_section.ContributionSubheading: Want to contribute to this project?

community_section.title: Our community
community_section.heading.1: Whether you’re submitting a new theme, improving existing plugins, or contributing code, your input helps us grow. Join the community, we welcome everyone with open arms. Just remember to be respectful: we are all humans after all.
community_section.discord.heading: Join our Discord
community_section.discord.body_text: Reach out to us via Discord and stay in touch with the latest updates and community news!
community_section.github.heading: Visit our GitHub
community_section.github.body_text: Go straight to the (open) source and see what we are up to on the code side of things
community_section.instagram.heading: Follow us on Instagram
community_section.instagram.body_text: Get behind-the-scenes looks, community highlights, and visual updates directly from our team.
community_section.twitter.heading: Follow us on X (Twitter)
community_section.twitter.body_text: Stay up to date with feature drops, announcements, and real-time updates in 280 characters or less.

testimonials_section.title: What our users think
testimonials_section.heading.1: We as builders and contributors are obviously biased, so here’s a few testimonials from our users. No paid partnerships, no marketing tricks—just honest-to-god thoughts from actual users.

sponsors_section.title: Sponsored by these awesome people
sponsors_section.heading.1: We offer an open-source solution and have lots of contributors but we all know that money runs this world and thus, also our project. This is where these awesome supporters come in and with the help of their generosity, we get to continue our mission.

sponsor_cta.title: Want to sponsor us?
sponsor_cta.description: We are always looking for more sponsors, be it individuals or companies. Every dollar helps and will be used to support this project.

call_to_action_section.title: Ready to build your own chatbot?
call_to_action_section.heading.1: Jump straight into our “Get started” guide or play around in our playground where there are no rules!

benefits_section.title: Benefits
benefits_section.body_text.1: Utilize pre-built themes and plugins to accelerate your development process.
benefits_section.body_text.2: Easily add new features and improve the user experience of your chatbot.
benefits_section.body_text.3: Join a community of like-minded developers, share your own creations, and contribute to the growth of the platform.

history_section.title: History and Background
history_section.body_text: React ChatBotify Gallery started as a project to complement the v2 release of React ChatBotify in 2024. It was born out of the need for a centralized repository of chatbot themes and plugins. As more developers began contributing, the platform quickly grew into a vibrant community, constantly evolving to meet the needs of its users.

mission_section.title: Mission and Vision
mission_section.body_text.1: Our mission is to empower developers by providing a centralized hub for sharing and discovering high-quality themes and plugins for React ChatBotify.
mission_section.body_text.2: We envision a vibrant community where creativity and collaboration thrive, enabling chatbots to become more customizable and accessible for everyone.
